item.title: FastSpeech 2: Fast and High-Quality End-to-End Text-to-Speech
item.description: Audio Samples All of the audio samples use Parallel WaveGAN (PWG) as vocoder. For all audio samples, the background noise of LJSpeech is reduced using spectral subtraction. The chapel yard led to the chapel, and on the staircase were two rooms frequently set apart for the king's witnesses. GT GT (PWG) Transformer TTS Your browser does not support the audio element. Your browser does not support the audio element.
